basics.name: Italo Zambrano
basics.label: Jr Full Stack Software Developer
basics.summary: I'm a Full Stack Software Developer with experience in building web applications. I have a passion for learning and sharing my knowledge with my teammates. I really enjoy working with Python and FastAPI in the backend but I also have experience with JavaScript and React in the frontend. In my free time I love to go to the gym, listening music and go out with my friends

work.name: ioet
work.summary: I'm working as a Full Stack Software Developer in the company. I have been working on several projects using different technologies, such as: python, golang for the Backend and TypeScript, NextJs in the Frontend and I have worked with NoSQL and SQL Databases. I also have experience working with AWS to deploy our applications.

work.name: ioet
work.summary: I was part of a program that allowed me to learn more about the software devopment. I had very experienced mentors who taught me about agile methodologies and different programming technologies.

work.name: TechnoFrog Inc
work.summary: I started a freelance company with friends. We offered advice and project realization in different programming languages such as: python, c++, java. We also offered programming courses for beginners and advanced students.
